detail_desc: Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a decorative tie at the hem.
Fitted top in a stretchy, fine rib knit with long sleeves and a cut-out section at the back.
Cropped, hooded jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and drawstring at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Fitted coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in an airy modal blend with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, a loose yoke at the back and a single back vent. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Shirt jacket in imitation suede with a collar and zip down the front. Open chest pocket, discreet side pockets and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with a round neckline.
Fine-knit, slightly longer jumper in slub cotton with ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details and patches on the inside of the legs. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Sandals in imitation leather with appliqués at the top and an adjustable strap with a hook and loop fastener at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Dungaree dress in cotton twill with an open chest pocket and flounce trimmed straps with adjustable buttoning at the front.
Top in fluted jersey with a square neckline, buttons down the front and short balloon sleeves with narrow elastication.
Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with a frill at the front. Narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, belt, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and long sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Belt in split leather with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a resort collar, French front, yoke at the back and straight-cut hem.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, zipped side pockets and back pockets with decorative seams. Tapered, shaped legs with seams at the knees.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.

Long-sleeved nursing dress in a soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Wide neckline and double-layered top at the front for easier nursing access, and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a wide neckline and a deep V-neck and gently draped wrapover at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Fully lined, super push-up balconette bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and an elasticated hem.
Suede mules with decorative flower appliqués at the front, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Jersey top with short, printed cap sleeves and a gathered flounce in woven fabric at the hem.
Ankle boots in soft suede with pointed toes, a decorative metal buckle on one side and a zip in the other side. Cotton twill linings and insoles. Covered block heels 5.5 cm.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Block-patterned silk handkerchief. Size 33x33 cm.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Oversized top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in airy, nepped jersey with a round neck, long sleeves and a lace-trimmed hem.

Waist bag in soft imitation leather with a large zipped compartment and an inner zipped compartment. Detachable metal chain at the front with carabiner hooks. Adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. Lined. Depth 5 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 27 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a ribbed waistband, fake fly and front and back pockets.
Long-sleeved blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the front. Seam with covered elastication at the waist and decorative ties at the sides.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Chinos in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket.
Short, fitted dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Bucket hat in soft cotton corduroy with ventilation holes in the sides.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, fitted body in lace with an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a seam at the hips and press-studs at the crotch.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized slipover in a soft knit with a V-neck and cable-knit sections at the front. Ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless playsuit in airy, patterned viscose with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam and twisted ties with tassels at the waist.
Fitted, one-shoulder top in a soft rib knit with one long sleeve.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a hole pattern. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Zipped front pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Suit trousers in twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Jetted front pockets, decorative slits at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets.

Short-sleeved dress in woven fabric containing glittery threads. Cap sleeves and a gentle V-neck with buttons at the back. Gathered seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front and a flared skirt. Longer at the back. Lined.

Short skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with wide ties at one side. Flounced trim down the front and a flounced hem. Unlined.
Wide trousers in a crêpe weave with a satin waistband. High waist, concealed zip in one side, side pockets, decorative welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Slim-fit jersey leggings in a stretch viscose blend with a print motif, elasticated waist and tapered legs with seams down the front and back.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.
Knee-length dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, side pockets and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Leather sandals with leather insoles and smooth ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Checked shirt in sturdy cotton with a turn-down collar, classic front and two flap chest pockets with a button. Long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.

Set with a long-sleeved top, pair of leggings and Santa hat in soft cotton jersey. Top with a print motif on the front and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in lightweight cotton denim. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and detachable tie belt, front pockets and tapered legs.
Calf-length dress in soft, rib-knit merino wool with a round neckline and long trumpet sleeves.

Set with a dress and leggings in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a seam at the waist, side pockets and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck with lacing at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.
